price: Ìwọ ìbáà ṣojú kòkòrò (ìgbàlà wọn), ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ ènìyàn ni kò níí gbàgbọ́.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
